column4: I am on Gutsy and want to see if I can connect to a network USB wireless adapter
the model number is MA111
How can I get it to work
plug it in
dmesg says ?
even in dmesg ?
type 'dmesg'
dmesg | tail
it does show the prism2usb on the list
can i pm you?
i have to identify firstm but yeah
i saw on the list about something being rejected due to insuffiencent bus power
perhaps you need a usb 2.0 or "high speed" port
what kind of message should i be getting?
check ifconfig -a to see if your device has registered
i do not see it, currently i am connected directly
dmesg says it registered properly/
i think there may not be suffecient bus power to the device
perhaps you cant use it on that port then
is a murderer?
he was referring to hans reiser
